duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a crew in the buildout, maintenance, and repair of DISH’s 5G network.
Perform work at both ground locations (working with electric components) and tower top locations (climbing up to 500 feet).
Maintain and repair equipment within wireless networks, including equipment upgrades.
Collaborate with Network Operations and Construction Operation teams.
Conduct Job Safety Analysis / Job Hazard Analysis at each job site.
File rigging plans with tower companies.
Provide training and mentorship to employees in the field according to company guidelines.
Travel to cellular tower sites to complete work on towers at height, while maintaining a focus on safety.
Wear Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) while on the tower site.
Interact and communicate with others, including face-to-face, phone, and chat messaging communications.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general education degree (GED) preferred; 3-5 years of experience working on communication towers surpassing 300 feet high preferred; industry certifications including but not limited to RF Safety Certificate, OSHA 10/30, NWSA, CPR/First Aid, etc.; valid driver’s license with good driving record.
